I've seen Getz platform throw out same job 2 diff order bike n car. Sometimes when the expensive order taken  the other order(be it bike or car) which is cheaper doesn't disappear. It stays there for quite awhile. That can be a red flag that platform may be waiting for some1 take the cheaper job
I kena b4 Getz order once. After that I don't take their jobs
Yea i have noticed before. I think even oddle has had such situations
Oddle mostly still stick to either bike or car
Correct oddle is the most stable in that sense typically
Getz will almost 70-80% have both
One thing bout getz also. If restaurant or merchant asks for order number usually we cant refer
Although on their side they have the receipt w the number
N Getz is more stingy. They tend not to give high demand surcharge or +$
Even when the original pick up time has passed by
So quite a few of their jobs always late for dropüòÇ
Based off observations. The most likely ones would be deliverychinatown/startaster followed by oddle
